attributes.action: say no to more and more tax hikes
attributes.additional_details: no more tax hikes ..because Osborne and his sidekicks can not run water , i believe that the tax in Britain should be looked at independently as far to much of our money is being wasted abroad , on fancy government charades and getting used on what these idiots think fit..why is it wages do not go up as fast as the taxes do,, we need expert people to run the treasury and not unelected idiots
